regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver in case of network issues, distinguishing it from a busy line or other connection failures.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling network issues during call connection
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver if network issues prevent the call from connecting, including a specific indication of the nature of the network issue.

regen.absent_element: indication of network issues when connecting the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver if the call connection fails due to network issues.

label: The functional identity includes the engine number, if no train number is available.
absence: situation of no train number is available
